about_me.title: About me
about_me.intro: What makes successful collaboration possible? A respectful environment, a team mindset, and clear, achievable goals. These values shape the way I work – focused, reliable, and with full commitment.

paragraphs.text: IT, project management, and communication are my core strengths. As a certified frontend developer and experienced agency lead, I combine technical skills with a solid understanding of workflows and business needs. The result: solutions that work – and that make sense from a client perspective.

As an IT Consultant, I bring structure to digital projects. My strengths include clear communication, purposeful team leadership, and turning technical requirements into practical, real-world solutions.

As a certified SCRUM Master, I work with agile methods like Kanban and iterative planning. This helps teams stay focused and flexible. My experience ranges from managing creative agency projects to hands-on development work – always aiming to deliver measurable value.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: A solid understanding of web technologies helps me support digital projects with clarity, structure, and a practical mindset.
skills.cta_message: Let’s talk about where I can contribute – I’d be happy to explore how we might work together.
skills.continual_learning_popup: I’m currently expanding my knowledge in AI and WordPress – always with a focus on practical application.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

project.popup_message: This project is still in progress. Stay tuned for updates!

projects.join_description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.pollo_loco_description: A simple Jump and Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to collect coins and avoid upcoming obstacles.
projects.pokedex_description: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogs Pokémon information.
projects.da_bubble_description: This App is a Slack clone app. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

contact.title: Contact
contact.question: Ready for the next step?
contact.intro: Reach out through this form. Let’s collaborate and bring your projects to success. I’m ready to contribute my skills.
contact.privacy_policy_text_end: and agree to the processing of my data.
contact.privacy-error: You must agree to the privacy policy to continue.
contact.thank_you: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you soon.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.general_info_text: The following information will provide you with an easy-to-navigate overview of what will happen with your personal data when you visit this website. The term 'personal data' comprises all data that can be used to personally identify you. For detailed information about the subject matter of data protection, please consult our Data Protection Declaration, which we have included beneath this copy.
privacy_policy.controller_title: Who is the responsible party for the recording of data on this website?
privacy_policy.controller_text: The data on this website is processed by the operator of the website, whose contact information is available under section 'Information about the responsible party' in this Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy.data_collection_how_title: How do we record your data?
privacy_policy.data_collection_how_text: We collect your data as a result of your sharing of your data with us. This may, for instance, be information you enter into our contact form. Other data shall be recorded by our IT systems automatically or after you consent to its recording during your website visit. This data comprises primarily technical information (e.g., web browser, operating system, or time the site was accessed). This information is recorded automatically when you access this website.
privacy_policy.data_usage_title: What are the purposes we use your data for?
privacy_policy.data_usage_text: A portion of the information is generated to guarantee the error-free provision of the website. Other data may be used to analyze your user patterns.
privacy_policy.user_rights_title: What rights do you have as far as your information is concerned?
privacy_policy.user_rights_text: You have the right to receive information about the source, recipients, and purposes of your archived personal data at any time without having to pay a fee for such disclosures. You also have the right to demand that your data be rectified or eradicated. If you have consented to data processing, you have the option to revoke this consent at any time, which shall affect all future data processing. Moreover, you have the right to demand that the processing of your data be restricted under certain circumstances. Furthermore, you have the right to log a complaint with the competent supervising agency.
privacy_policy.hosting_text: We are hosting the content of our website at the following provider:
privacy_policy.provider_text: The provider is Strato AG, Otto-Ostrowski-Straße 7, 10249 Berlin. When you visit our website, Strato records various logfiles, including your IP addresses. For more information, please consult the Strato Data Privacy Policy: https://www.strato.de/datenschutz/
privacy_policy.storage_duration_text: Unless a more specific storage period has been specified in this privacy policy, your personal data will remain with us until the purpose for which it was collected no longer applies. If you assert a justified request for deletion or revoke your consent to data processing, your data will be deleted unless we have other legally permissible reasons for storing your personal data (e.g., tax or commercial law retention periods); in the latter case, the deletion will take place after these reasons cease to apply.
privacy_policy.right_data_portability_text: You have the right to have data that we process automatically on the basis of your consent or in fulfillment of a contract handed over to you or to a third party in a common, machine-readable format. If you should demand the direct transfer of the data to another controller, this will be done only if it is technically feasible.
privacy_policy.ssl_tls_text: For security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, such as purchase orders or inquiries you submit to us as the website operator, this website uses either an SSL or a TLS encryption program. You can recognize an encrypted connection by checking whether the address line of the browser switches from 'http://' to 'https://' and by the appearance of the lock icon in the browser line.
privacy_policy.linkedin_text: This website uses elements of the LinkedIn network. The provider is LinkedIn Ireland Unlimited Company, Wilton Plaza, Wilton Place, Dublin 2, Ireland. Any time you access a page of this website that contains elements of LinkedIn, a connection to LinkedIn's servers is established. LinkedIn is notified that you have visited this website with your IP address. If you click on LinkedIn’s 'Recommend' button and are logged into your LinkedIn account at the time, LinkedIn will be in a position to allocate your visit to this website to your LinkedIn user account.
privacy_policy.linkedin_insight_text: This website uses the Insight Tag from LinkedIn. This service is provided by LinkedIn Ireland Unlimited Company, Wilton Plaza, Wilton Place, Dublin 2, Ireland. We use the LinkedIn Insight Tag to obtain information about visitors to our website. Once a website visitor is registered with LinkedIn, we can analyze the key occupational data (e.g., career level, company size, country, location, industry, job title) of our website visitors to help us better target our site to the relevant audience.
